message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it has great value and I'm willing to sell it to you at a competitive price. I've taken into consideration its worth to you and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $700000. Would you be willing to sell the product at this price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you're looking to spend no more than $700000, but I'm afraid I need to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. I'll meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer.
